パッケージ io.github.townyadvanced.flagwar.listeners

クラス FlagWarBlockListener

java.lang.Object
io.github.townyadvanced.flagwar.listeners.FlagWarBlockListener
すべての実装されたインタフェース:
org.bukkit.event.Listener
public class FlagWarBlockListener extends Object implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
Listens for interactions with Blocks, then runs a check if qualified. Used for flag protections and triggering CellAttackEvents.

  • コンストラクタの概要

    コンストラクタ
    コンストラクタ
    説明
    FlagWarBlockListener(FlagWar flagWar)
    Constructs the FlagWarBlockListener, setting towny.

  • メソッドの概要

    修飾子とタイプ
    メソッド
    説明
    void
    onBlockBreak(org.bukkit.event.block.BlockBreakEvent blockBreakEvent)
    Runs FlagWar.checkBlock(Player, Block, org.bukkit.event.Cancellable) using the event's Player, Block, and the BlockBreakEvent itself.
    void
    onBlockBurn(org.bukkit.event.block.BlockBurnEvent blockBurnEvent)
    Runs FlagWar.checkBlock(Player, Block, org.bukkit.event.Cancellable) using the event's Player, Block, and the BlockBurnEvent itself.
    void
    onBlockPistonExtend(org.bukkit.event.block.BlockPistonExtendEvent blockPistonExtendEvent)
    Iteratively runs over FlagWar.checkBlock(Player, Block, org.bukkit.event.Cancellable) using the event's Player, Block (BlockPistonExtendEvent.getBlocks()), and the BlockPistonExtendEvent itself.
    void
    onBlockPistonRetract(org.bukkit.event.block.BlockPistonRetractEvent blockPistonRetractEvent)
    Iteratively runs over FlagWar.checkBlock(Player, Block, org.bukkit.event.Cancellable) using the event's Player, Block (BlockPistonRetractEvent.getBlocks()), and the BlockPistonRetractEvent itself.
    void
    onFlagWarFlagPlace(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.event.actions.TownyBuildEvent townyBuildEvent)
    Check if the Player from TownyActionEvent.getPlayer() is attempting to build inside enemy lands, and if so, tryCallCellAttack(TownyActionEvent, Player, Block, WorldCoord).

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • コンストラクタの詳細

    • FlagWarBlockListener

      public FlagWarBlockListener(FlagWar flagWar)
      Constructs the FlagWarBlockListener, setting towny.
      パラメータ:

  • メソッドの詳細

    • onFlagWarFlagPlace

      public void onFlagWarFlagPlace(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.event.actions.TownyBuildEvent townyBuildEvent)
      Check if the Player from TownyActionEvent.getPlayer() is attempting to build inside enemy lands, and if so, tryCallCellAttack(TownyActionEvent, Player, Block, WorldCoord).
      パラメータ:
      townyBuildEvent - the TownyBuildEvent.

    • onBlockBreak

      public void onBlockBreak(org.bukkit.event.block.BlockBreakEvent blockBreakEvent)
      Runs FlagWar.checkBlock(Player, Block, org.bukkit.event.Cancellable) using the event's Player, Block, and the BlockBreakEvent itself.
      パラメータ:
      blockBreakEvent - the BlockBreakEvent.

    • onBlockBurn

      public void onBlockBurn(org.bukkit.event.block.BlockBurnEvent blockBurnEvent)
      Runs FlagWar.checkBlock(Player, Block, org.bukkit.event.Cancellable) using the event's Player, Block, and the BlockBurnEvent itself.
      パラメータ:
      blockBurnEvent - the BlockBurnEvent.

    • onBlockPistonExtend

      public void onBlockPistonExtend(org.bukkit.event.block.BlockPistonExtendEvent blockPistonExtendEvent)
      Iteratively runs over FlagWar.checkBlock(Player, Block, org.bukkit.event.Cancellable) using the event's Player, Block (BlockPistonExtendEvent.getBlocks()), and the BlockPistonExtendEvent itself.
      パラメータ:
      blockPistonExtendEvent - the BlockPistonExtendEvent.

    • onBlockPistonRetract

      public void onBlockPistonRetract(org.bukkit.event.block.BlockPistonRetractEvent blockPistonRetractEvent)
      Iteratively runs over FlagWar.checkBlock(Player, Block, org.bukkit.event.Cancellable) using the event's Player, Block (BlockPistonRetractEvent.getBlocks()), and the BlockPistonRetractEvent itself.
      Fails fast if BlockPistonEvent.isSticky() is false.
      パラメータ:
      blockPistonRetractEvent - the BlockPistonRetractEvent.
